entry.string: You must enable cookies on your browser to run Xaraya. Check the browser configuration options to make sure cookies are enabled, click on the "Back" button of the browser and try again.
entry.translation: Sie müssen Cookies im Browser zulassen. Prüfen Sie die Browserkonfiguration, um sicherzustellen, dass Cookies zugelassen sind. Versuchen Sie es dann nochmal.

entry.string: Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
entry.translation: Ihr Konto wurde für #(1) Minuten gesperrt.

entry.string: Unknown state: could not log in
The account you logged in to has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discretion.
The account you logged in to account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. You have tried to log in #(1) times.
The account you logged in to has not yet been activated by the site administrator
